properties.Name: ConsumerMortgageStatus
properties.Description: The status of the mortgage as of the date for the associated reporting period.

Columns.Name: CreditGrantorId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Credit Grantor.

Columns.Name: MortgageLoanAccountNumber
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer Account.

Columns.Name: ReportingDate
Columns.Description:
The date of the associated status.

Ex:

For the period Oct 1- Oct 31, the status of the credit card is detailed as of the date Oct 15.

Columns.Name: MortgageBalanceAmount
Columns.Description: The balance on a loan account is the amount remaining to be paid back.

Columns.Name: MortgageTotalInterestPaid
Columns.Description: The total amount of interest paid to date upon the loan.

Columns.Name: MortgageTotalPrincipalPaid
Columns.Description: The total amount of principal paid to date upon the loan.

Columns.Name: MortgageLastPaymentMadeDate
Columns.Description: The date of the last payment.

Columns.Name: MortgageLastPaymentMadeAmount
Columns.Description: The amount of the last payment.

Columns.Name: MortgageTotalOverduePaymentsAmount
Columns.Description: The total amount of overdue mortgage payments.

Columns.Name: MortgageTotalDefaultPaymentsAmount
Columns.Description: The total amount of default mortgage payments.

Columns.Name: AccountStatusId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Account Status.

Properties.Description: The status of the mortgage as of the date for the associated reporting period.
